description: Covid-19 has changed the "funding landscape" for the overhaul of Ramsey Courthouse, a charity says.
title: Coronavirus: Ramsey courthouse conversion plans 'hit by pandemic'
title_page: Coronavirus: Ramsey courthouse conversion plans 'hit by pandemic' - BBC News
maintext: "As such we felt it was not appropriate to extend our period of exclusivity beyond its initial length, as to do so would block other potential solutions from emerging for this important building," he said.
